sense.def:
One's neck
je del telesa, ki povezuje glavo s trupom.

seg.quote: She threw her arms around his neck.
The cat had a blue collar round its neck.

sense.def:
The neck of a dress or shirt
je del obleke ali srajce okoli vratu ali tik pod njim.

seg.quote: His shirt was open at the neck.

sense.def:
The neck of a bottle
je ozek gornji del steklenice.

Kadar je človek
up to his neck in problems
, ima hude neprijetnosti zaradi njih.

seg.quote: You were up to your neck in trouble with the press.

cit.quote: dihati komu za ovratnik; imeti na očeh

sense.def:
To risk one's neck
pomeni, da nekdo naredi kaj zelo nevarnega, da bi nekaj dosegel ali nekomu pomagal.

seg.quote: I thanked him for risking his neck for me.

sense.def:
To stick one's neck out
pomeni, da nekdo naredi nekaj, s čimer si nakoplje očitke ali težave;

seg.quote: Let someone else stick their neck out and take responsibility.
